name: Sonic the Hedgehog Adventures - Sonic's Fantastic Adventure
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog Adventures - Sonic's Fantastic Adventure
description: WOW! This is my Nickelodeon Sonic Game. It's called Sonic's Fantastic Adventure. Sonic the Hedgehog Belongs to SEGA. Sonic the Hedgehog Adventures belongs to SEGA and Nickelodeon.
